Class CIResultObject

java.lang.Object
dd2480.ciserver.model.CIResultObject
public class CIResultObject extends Object
This class is a data object that contains the results of a CI run. It includes the commit SHA, branch name, build success status, tests success status, and an error message.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • CIResultObject

      public CIResultObject(String currentCommitSHA, String currentBranchName)
      Constructor for initializing the parameters of the result object.
      Parameters:
      currentCommitSHA - is the ID of the commit that is being run in the CI.
      currentBranchName - is the name of the branch that the commit belongs to.

  • Method Details

    • isCIResultSuccessful

      public boolean isCIResultSuccessful()
      Method to check if the CI is successfull.
      Returns:
      true if both build and tests are successful, false otherwise.

    • getCommitSHA

      public String getCommitSHA()
      Getter to retrieve the commit SHA.
      Returns:
      the commit SHA as a string.

    • getBranchName

      public String getBranchName()
      Getter to retrieve the branch name.
      Returns:
      the branch name as a string.

    • isBuildSuccessful

      public boolean isBuildSuccessful()
      Getter to retreive the build success status.
      Returns:
      the boolean value of build success status.

    • isTestsSuccessful

      public boolean isTestsSuccessful()
      Getter to retrieve the tests success status.
      Returns:
      the boolean value of tests success status.

    • getErrorMessage

      public String getErrorMessage()
      Getter to retrieve the error message.
      Returns:
      error message as a string if CI fails, otherwise null.

    • setBuildSuccessful

      public void setBuildSuccessful(boolean buildSuccessful)
      Setter to update the buildSuccessful value.
      Parameters:
      buildSuccessful - is true if build is successful, false otherwise.

    • setTestsSuccessful

      public void setTestsSuccessful(boolean testsSuccessful)
      Setter to update the testsSuccessful value.
      Parameters:
      testsSuccessful - is true if tests are successful, false otherwise.

    • setErrorMessage

      public void setErrorMessage(String errorMessage)
      Setter to update the error message.
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - contains information about what failed in the CI run.

    • getBuildLog

      public String getBuildLog()
      Getter to retrieve the build log.
      Returns:
      the full build log output as a string.

    • setBuildLog

      public void setBuildLog(String buildLog)
      Setter to update the build log.
      Parameters:
      buildLog - the full output from the build and test processes.

    • appendBuildLog

      public void appendBuildLog(String log)
      Appends additional output to the existing build log.
      Parameters:
      log - the additional log output to append.
